https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xK2jD29GnhmJt6qexwurOPa2Mdu.jpg Teddy and Lloyd, each hopelessly depressed, strike up a friendship at their 10-year high school reunion and decide to turn their lives around. They decide to break things down to basics and set a very clear and simple goal for themselves: to just be awesome. Being Awesome
